title: pati nI anrO
sahitya:
pati nI anrO enrum enakkiniya


anupallavi

  gati nIyE enru kazhaliNai aDaindEn pati bhUpati jagatpati en kula


caraNam    dikku triyAmal tavittiDa pOdinil tittikkum un nAmam oLI kATTumE
 ekkaStam vandAlum Etradait-tUIttiDA ezhil mEni nenjil uram kUTTUmE
 mukkAlam uNarnda munivargaLum nADum mOkSam aLittiDum maukundA nI
 takka taruNattil en karam piDittu un tAL malar aNaivikkum dayAnidhi jagat
